description.translate: Untiringly, carry dreams to wonderful horizons.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Zéphyr\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Inlassablement, emporte les rêves\"}","{\"text\":\"§7vers des horizonx merveilleux.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Untiringly, carry dreams\"}","{\"text\":\"§7to wonderful horizons.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7力§a1 §7速度§a1 §7運§a1 §7恢魔§c-1\"}"]}}
